resources.string: requestCode in intent does not match the parent requestCode

string-array.name: todo_detail
string-array.item: Waking up is generally not a pleasant activity, but it must be done once a day!
To start the day, you must break the fast you had during sleep and eat to fuel yourself for the day!
Maintains your health and give your body a healthy dose of oxygen!
Helps boost creativity and gives a great exercise for your brain.
6 hours is a MUST; drink hot choco - gives a great nights sleep.
